N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.7 - Statement to employee

State Regulations

Every employer covered by this Part shall furnish to
each employee a statement with every payment of wages, listing hours worked, rates paid, gross wages, allowances, if any, claimed as part of the minimum
wage, deductions and net wages. Notes
